main event: An observer reported a sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) described as an ovol-round object on 13 September 1955 in Springfield, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was observed for 45 seconds,The UFO was the size of a dime held at arm's length,The object flew from east to west before making a 90-degree turn south and rapidly disappearing, The observer saw a possible exhaust trail that may have been from a jet aircraft, The conclusions drawn included possibilities such as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon, though data was considered insufficient for a definitive evaluation.
witness description: The observer was sighting for aircraft and was described as a student under age.
